Class WrongParameterValueException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.ParameterException
          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.WrongParameterValueException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnspecifiedParameterException

    public class WrongParameterValueException
extends ParameterException
    Thrown by a Parameterizable object in case of wrong parameter format.
    Author:
    Steffi Wanka
